tool.name: PDAUG Peptide Core Descriptors
tool.description: Calculates core descriptors of peptide sequences
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
Calculates the frequency of ngrames in peptide sequences.
-----
**Inputs** * **--InFile** Fasta file with peptide sequences as Input File. * **--Ngrams** Integer value of Ngrams frequency to be calculated.
-----
**Outputs** * **--OutFile** Returns tabular data file.
